zh.title: 以太坊/美元技术分析：[震荡整理趋势]
zh.content:
当前以太坊（ETH/USD）价格为2944.71，24小时内小幅下跌0.56%。从高点2988.16回落至低点2942.8，显示出市场在此区间内的震荡整理趋势。短期内，市场情绪较为谨慎，投资者需密切关注价格在该区间的表现。

技术指标方面，MACD显示出正值25.52388，表明市场存在一定的上行动能，但由于缺乏更多的信号线数据，趋势的持续性尚不明朗。SMA(20)为2893.8175，作为短期移动平均线，提供了一个支撑位，若价格下行突破此点位，则可能引发进一步的卖压。

在支撑和阻力位方面，2942.8为当前的重要支撑位，如果跌破可能会测试更低的支撑区间。上方阻力位则在2988.16一线，突破该点位可能会引发短期的反弹。投资者应观察这些关键价位的表现，以决定适当的进场和出场策略。

交易建议方面，建议在2942.8附近寻找买入机会，设立止损位于2890下方，以降低风险。如果价格突破2988.16，考虑逐步加仓以捕捉潜在的上涨行情。同时，保持对市场情绪和技术指标的敏感，以便及时调整策略。

en.title: Ethereum vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Ethereum against the US Dollar stands at 2944.71, reflecting a slight decline of 0.56% over the past 24 hours. This minor downturn follows a recent peak at 2988.16, indicating that the market may be facing resistance at this level. The recent high suggests that bullish sentiment remains, but the inability to maintain momentum above this threshold could lead to increased volatility as traders reassess their positions.

In terms of technical indicators, the moving average (SMA) of 20 periods at 2893.82 serves as a crucial support level. Should the price dip below this level, it could trigger further selling pressure, potentially opening the door for a deeper correction toward the next significant support around 2800. Conversely, if Ethereum manages to reclaim and sustain levels above 2988.16, it may pave the way for a rally toward the psychological resistance at 3000, where profit-taking could occur.

The MACD currently shows a positive divergence at 25.52, which could indicate underlying bullish momentum despite the recent price decline. However, the absence of a signal line complicates the interpretation of trend strength. Traders should remain cautious and wait for additional confirmation, as a crossover in the MACD could present a clearer entry point. Additionally, monitoring the RSI once available will provide insights into overbought or oversold conditions that can influence trading decisions.

For traders looking to enter positions, it may be prudent to consider a cautious approach. A buy signal could emerge if ETH/USD breaks above 2988.16 with strong volume, while a sell signal might be warranted if the price falls below the 20-period SMA at 2893.82. Keeping an eye on volume and market sentiment will be essential in navigating potential price fluctuations in the coming sessions.
